content: Something to remember: you didn’t choose your spiritual and psychological hitches — but trolls deliberately choose to be evil. No matter how pathetic you feel you feel yourself to be, no matter how low you ever believe you are, you will never in a million years be as pathetic as people who choose to mock and taunt someone for serious problems that are out of their control. And please accept a smile and a virtual hug from me over the net. :-)
